BIOGRAPHY #UNSOLVED_MYSTERY HERE FOLKS ALL OF THEM HAVE #BLOOD_ON_HANDS! #Pharmaceutical_Giant #SHIPPED Investigational Coronavirus #Drug to #China Without U.S. #Approval | 4.', 'A group of Polish physicians attempted to warn the public that the COVID-19 mRNA vaccinations were not safe and effective. Countless evidence and studies have proven that the vaccination did more harm than good. Yet, Poland has placed 45 doctors on trial for spreading anti-vaccine misinformation during the pandemic. If found guilty, these men and women will lose their medical 45 physicians are part of the Polish Association of Independent Physicians and Scientists (PSNLiN), a group that actively sought to warn the public about the harmful side effects of the mRNA vaccine. Their mission as stated on their website: Freeing the medical profession and scientists from enslavement and restoring professional and scientific freedom. Promoting prevention and treatment according to the doctors and patients choice. Why should the government force vaccines upon the population and have the ability to override trained medical professionals?Pfizer_CEO_Vaccines LimitedDr. Peter Kotlr, physician and member of the Slovak Parliament, firmly believes that the vaccine was not a true vaccination but an attempt at genetic modification. As we know, the COVID-19 injections were only labeled as a vaccine when the CDC changed the definition."I will tell you one thing that please publish in your media. This is the result of the analysis of Slovak vaccines. On average, Moderna, mRNA content 10e9 - 10e10. DNA in Moderna 10e7 - 10e9. As for contamination after the production process. We talked about the amount of 10 to 2.3 at most. This is such a huge amount of genetic information that it can be safely, officially called gene therapy. This is not a vaccine. Now I am not talking about the pathological effect of protein S, which is a product of mRNA. This goes a different way. But the incorporation of DNA into human DNA will make you a genetically modified organism and can permanently produce protein S, which is toxic. This issue can be inherited and can cause other serious disorders and diseases." - Dr. Peter Kotlar."My main task is to uphold the constitution, and as a doctor I have the duty and right to protect the health of Slovak citizens. Yesterday I also informed the US Minister of Health and Human Services, Mr. Robert Kennedy Jr., by letter, who confirmed receipt of the information. In addition, the Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation, Kash Patel, and Pamela Bondi, the US Attorney General, were also informed."So far, 34 batches from Pfizer and Moderna have been analyzed, which were stored in accordance with the proper cold chain and only those that were used for the Slovak population during the C19 epidemic. Today I will present the most important result of the analysis.""The results of the analysis of all, I repeat, all tested batches showed that in each individual vial there is an extremely large amount of DNA, a vector encoding a cassette for the synthesis of the S protein, if not other proteins. Almost in the same amount as mRNA, DNA is also present there. In three cases, the DNA content is even higher than the mRNA. It can no longer even be considered an mRNA vaccine. This genetic code for the synthesis of the S protein, this information stored in DNA, is stable compared to mRNA, it can integrate with human nuclear DNA, and then such a human organism becomes - I am not afraid to say officially - a genetically modified organism," said Dr. Peter KotlrThere are countless studies proving that the COVID vaccination had significant, life-altering, if not life-ending, side effects that were not presented to the public. Yet, the Polish government wants to dismiss every doctor who disobeyed their orders.', 'The May 2025 Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs Permanent Subcommittee hearing revealed extensive concerns and criticisms regarding COVID-19 mRNA vaccines, particularly about how health officials handled myocarditis and other adverse events. Here is a detailed update based on the hearing and related sources:## Key Testimony and Findings from the Senate Hearing- **Suppression and Downplaying of Risks:** The Biden administration and federal health agencies were accused of knowing about myocarditis and other cardiac risks from early 2021 but deliberately downplaying and delaying warnings to avoid vaccine hesitancy. Subpoenaed documents showed officials withheld or ignored safety data and failed to issue timely health alerts to physicians[3][5].- **Myocarditis and Heart Attacks:** Multiple experts, including Dr. Jordan Vaughn and Dr. Peter McCullough, testified that myocarditisheart inflammationwas a clear safety signal emerging early in the vaccine rollout, particularly in young males. Fatal cases were confirmed by autopsy, showing spike protein and mRNA in heart tissue. Heart attacks and arrhythmias were also reported as vaccine-related adverse events[2][4][5].- **Spike Protein and Biodistribution:** Studies presented indicated that vaccine mRNA and spike protein do not remain localized but distribute to organs including the heart, placenta, and ovaries. Spike protein can persist in circulation for six to nine months post-vaccination, potentially causing vascular and immune system damage[2][4].- **Pregnancy and Reproductive Harm:** Dr. James Thorp and others testified about significant adverse pregnancy outcomes linked to mRNA vaccines, including miscarriage, stillbirth, birth defects, cervical insufficiency, premature rupture of membranes, preterm birth, and newborn death. Research showed vaccine components cross the placenta, producing spike protein in fetal blood and placental tissues. Animal studies revealed up to 60% destruction of ovarian reserve in rats after mRNA vaccination. The testimony accused medical organizations (ACOG, ABOG, SMFM) of abandoning ethical responsibilities by promoting vaccines to pregnant women despite these risks[4].- **Long-Term and Other Adverse Effects:** Physicians reported thousands of patients suffering from long COVID-like symptoms and vaccine injury, including autoimmune disorders, transverse myelitis, and autonomic dysfunction. Many patients felt ignored or dismissed by public health systems[2][4][5].- **Regulatory Failures:** The hearing criticized the FDA and CDC for failing to adequately regulate, warn, or inform the public and medical professionals about these risks. The FDA only recently expanded myocarditis warnings to include males aged 16-25 after new data emerged, years after initial signals appeared[6][7].## Comprehensive List of Reported Issues Associated with mRNA COVID-19 Vaccines| Issue | Details | Frequency/Severity ||-------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------|| Myocarditis/Pericarditis | Heart inflammation, especially in young males; confirmed fatal cases with spike protein in heart tissue | Rare but serious || Heart Attacks and Arrhythmias | Cardiac events including heart attacks and irregular heartbeats reported post-vaccination | Very rare but documented || Deaths | Fatal myocarditis and other vaccine-related deaths confirmed by autopsy | Extremely rare || Blood Clotting Disorders | Spike protein may cause fibrin resistant to breakdown, leading to clotting issues | Rare || Long COVID-like and Autoimmune Symptoms | Fatigue, neurological symptoms, autoimmune disorders, transverse myelitis, autonomic dysfunction | Uncommon but disabling || Pregnancy Complications | Miscarriage, stillbirth, birth defects, cervical insufficiency, premature rupture of membranes, newborn death | Significantly associated in testimony || Ovarian Reserve Depletion | Animal studies showed 60% destruction of ovarian reserve in rats post-vaccination | Experimental data || Other Common Side Effects | Injection site pain, headache, muscle aches, fatigue, fever, swollen lymph nodes | Common, usually mild and transient |## Additional Context- The hearing exposed a pattern of governmental and institutional suppression of adverse event data and delayed communication to the public and healthcare providers, violating principles of informed consent[3][5].- Despite these concerns, public health authorities maintain that vaccine benefits outweigh risks, especially compared to COVID-19 infection itself, which also carries higher risks of myocarditis and other complications. However, critics argue the risks were not transparently communicated[1].- The FDA has recently updated vaccine labels to expand myocarditis warnings for males aged 16-25, acknowledging the higher risk in this group[6][7].- The hearing and testimonies have fueled ongoing debates about vaccine safety, regulatory transparency, and ethical responsibilities of medical organizations and government agencies[8].## SummaryThe May 2025 Senate hearing brought to light substantial evidence and expert testimony that mRNA COVID-19 vaccines have caused rare but serious adverse events, including myocarditis, heart attacks, deaths, and significant pregnancy complications. It also revealed governmental and institutional failures to adequately warn the public and medical community about these risks in a timely manner. The hearing called for accountability, transparency, and an immediate halt to promotion of mRNA vaccines in pregnant women until safety can be assured.---This summary is based on multiple sources including Senate hearing transcripts, expert testimonies, FDA communications, and investigative reports[2][3][4][5][6][7].Citations:[1] ## Latest Information from Senate Hearing on COVID-19 mRNA Vaccine Safety**Key Testimony and Findings (May 2025 Senate Hearing):**- **Biodistribution and Cardiac Concerns:** Dr. Jordan Vaughn and other experts testified that mRNA vaccines, contrary to initial claims, do not always stay at the injection site. Recent studies using advanced imaging in animal models have shown lipid nanoparticles (LNPs) and mRNA accumulating in heart tissue, leading to adverse changes in immune and vascular proteins. This finding aligns with observed cases of myocarditis (heart inflammation), particularly in young males, linked to mRNA vaccines[2].- **Spike Protein Persistence:** Evidence was presented that spike protein, produced by the vaccine, can circulate in the blood for six to nine months post-vaccination. This prolonged presence is associated with potential vascular and cardiac complications, including myocarditis and, in rare cases, fatal outcomes confirmed by autopsy[2].- **Myocarditis and Heart Attacks:** The hearing highlighted a clear safety signal for myocarditisespecially in young malesemerging as early as Spring 2021. There have been confirmed cases of fatal vaccine-induced myocarditis, with spike protein and mRNA detected in heart tissue during autopsies of individuals who died after vaccination[2].- **Long COVID and Vaccine Injury:** Physicians reported treating thousands of patients for long COVID and vaccine injury, including previously healthy young people. Some patients experienced disabling symptoms post-vaccination, with many feeling dismissed by public health systems[2].## Comprehensive List of Reported Issues with mRNA COVID-19 Vaccines| **Issue** | **Details** | **Frequency/Severity** ||----------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------|| Myocarditis/Pericarditis | Heart inflammation, especially in young males; can be severe, sometimes fatal[2][4]. | Rare (approx. 8.5 per million), usually mild[4]. || Heart Attacks | Some reports of cardiac events post-vaccination; causality debated[2]. | Very rare; risk higher after COVID infection[4]. || Arrhythmias | Irregular heartbeats reported, but more common after COVID infection than vaccination[4]. | Rare. || Deaths | Very rare cases of fatal myocarditis confirmed by autopsy[2]. | Extremely rare. || Blood Clotting Disorders | Spike protein may induce fibrin resistant to breakdown, causing clotting issues[2]. | Rare. || Long COVID-like Symptoms | Fatigue, shortness of breath, neurological symptoms reported by some post-vaccination[2]. | Uncommon. || Pregnancy Complications | Studies show similar rates of miscarriage, stillbirth, and fetal abnormalities in vaccinated and unvaccinated pregnant women[3]. | No increased risk found[3]. || Miscarriages | No evidence of increased risk compared to unvaccinated pregnancies[3]. | No significant difference[3]. || Other Side Effects | Injection site pain, headache, muscle aches, fatigue, fever, chills, nausea, swollen lymph nodes[3][4]. | Common, mild, and transient. |## Additional Details and Context- **Comparison to COVID-19 Infection:** The risk of myocarditis, heart attacks, and arrhythmias is higher after COVID-19 infection than after vaccination[4].- **Pregnancy Outcomes:** Large cohort studies have found no significant difference in adverse pregnancy outcomes (miscarriage, stillbirth, fetal abnormalities) between vaccinated and unvaccinated women[3].- **Disinformation and Misinformation:** The hearing and related analysis stressed the challenge of combating misinformation, including unfounded claims about cancer, nanobots, or graphene oxide in vaccines. None of these claims are supported by credible scientific evidence or regulatory findings[1].- **Regulatory Oversight:** Vaccines undergo rigorous safety monitoring, and rare adverse events are continually assessed by health authorities[1].## ConclusionThe latest Senate hearing underscored that while mRNA COVID-19 vaccines have rare but real risksmost notably myocarditis, especially in young malesthe overall risk remains low and is outweighed by the higher risk of complications from COVID-19 infection itself. No credible evidence links the vaccines to increased risk of miscarriage, stillbirth, or cancer. Most side effects are mild and transient. Misinformation remains a significant public health challenge, and ongoing transparent communication is essential[1][2][3][4].Citations:[1]']

Kennedy Jr. confirms that Anthony Fauci experimented on, tortured and killed innocent orphansThis is just a small example of the industrial-scale torture and murder of small children by the KM.', 'From David Cha:The revelations from the suspension of USAID have been nothing short of monumental. What has the US government been funding? Basically, everything. Nearly all MSM worldwide is funded by the US government, including 6,200 journalists, 707 media outlets, and 279 NGOs - and that\'s just through USAID. That includes Reuters, Associated Press, BBC, The Guardian, NBC, CNN, NPR, NYT, Politico, PBS, The Financial Times, The Atlantic, The Daily Telegraph, and much, much more. The entire anti-China media "ecosystem" is reliant on US government funding, and is now freaking-out of the funding suspension. UK state media (which is basically all UK MSM) isn\'t just UK state media, but is also US state media, funded by the US state. The Balkan countries run on US funding. Worldwide, MSM is US state received millions in funding from the US government specifically for "active social engineering" and "large scale social deception". And USAID sends a rulebook to media outlets around the world, telling them what they may and may-not report on, calling it "policies for strategic silence".The funding isn\'t just coming from USAID, which, like the NED, serves as another extension of the CIA, but also other US government institutions, including US Agency for Global Media, Department of State, Department of Defence, the Executive Office of the President, Department of Health and Human Services, Department of Education, Department of Justice, and more US government the funding from USAID doesn\'t just go towards US state propaganda. Labour unions are funded by the US. USAID also funded Covid-19\'s lab development, funded the Maidan protest in Ukraine that led to the coup that started the war, funded the multiple coup attempts in Georgia last year, is currently funding a coup attempt in Slovakia, funded multiple coup attempts in Venezuela (Juan Guaido received $98 million from USAID), funded celebrity trips to Zelensky, to boost his popularity, funded al Qaeda in Syria to overthrow Syria\'s there is so much more that is going on with the USAID revelations. Name: 5_economy_assets_wealth_market
Representative_Docs: ['Corporate strategy in America today is about orchestrating bottlenecks, because if you can create a chokepoint, aka some form of a monopolistic toll booth or restraint of trade, you can charge more money. The U.S. economic strategy, as we learned during Covid, is about creating precisely such bottlenecks. Whether done through copyright, patent, cost of capital, merger, price discrimination, foreclosing a rival from getting access to the market, surveillance, limiting homebuilding by sitting on land, or any other tactic, broadly speaking, all inflating financial assets does is hinder production. Thats the point, withhold supply, increase the what this mass seizure of property from the middle class, and the destruction of our productive capacity, did was part of our national strategy. When foreigners bought up U.S. dollar assets, more stocks and bonds, there were brief moments when Americans became afraid that, say, the Japanese would dominate our economy. But what ended up happening is that Wall Street created a bunch of American billionaires through financial asset appreciation. Foreigners owned huge amounts of dollar assets, but so did U.S. oligarchs. We fostered a global superclass aligned with this U.S. strategy. Bill Gates, the Saudi petrodollar, monarchy and Masayoshi Son of Softbank became a global system.', 'Corporate strategy in America today is about orchestrating bottlenecks, because if you can create a chokepoint, aka some form of a monopolistic toll booth or restraint of trade, you can charge more money. But what ended up happening is that Wall Street created a bunch of American billionaires through financial asset appreciation. Foreigners owned huge amounts of dollar assets, but so did U.S. oligarchs. We fostered a global superclass aligned with this U.S. strategy. Bill Gates, the Saudi petrodollar, monarchy and Masayoshi Son of Softbank became a global system.', 'Corporate strategy in America today is about orchestrating bottlenecks, because if you can create a chokepoint, aka some form of a monopolistic toll booth or restraint of trade, you can charge more money. The U.S. economic strategy, as we learned during Covid, is about creating precisely such bottlenecks. Whether done through copyright, patent, cost of capital, merger, price discrimination, foreclosing a rival from getting access to the market, surveillance, limiting homebuilding by sitting on land, or any other tactic, broadly speaking, all inflating financial assets does is hinder production. Thats the point, withhold supply, increase the price. But what this mass seizure of property from the middle class, and the destruction of our productive capacity, did was part of our national strategy. Name: 6_canada_canadian_minister_government
Representative_Docs: ['TRANADA FROZE MEAGHAN MURPHY\'S BANK ACCOUNT! "As most of my followers know, I left Canada in January 2021 out of genuine concern that if I didnt, I would never be able to leave. I predicted I would be targeted by the government on account of my political dissidencespecifically due to my criticisms of Covid mandates, increasing authoritarianism, and attacks on free speech by the government, as well as on account of the fact I have been the most prominent and vocal critic of gender identity ideology and legislation in Canada for over a decade now. I went to Mexico and watched things get progressively worse in Canada. My choice to leave was reaffirmed over and over again. When Trudeaus Liberals went after the Freedom Convoy and its supporters, freezing the bank accounts of Canadian citizens who had done nothing wrong, but were fighting for their Charter rights, I began limiting my dependence on Canadian banking institutions as well. This was a dangerous, authoritarian government and I didnt want to be left vulnerable and dependent on a government I suspected would attempt to silence and destroy me in one way or another. Despite this, I have maintained a much stronger connection to Canada than our apparent Prime Minister, Mark Carney, as I have continued to return to the country to fight for womens rights, speak at events, visit family and friends, and to cover Canadian politics extensively in my work. I still hadnt completely given up on the country, and with an election pending, I saw one last opportunity to fight for change, and to force some conversations that had been suppressed in my progressive Vancouver East riding. Last month, I decided to run as a Canadian Member of Parliament, and began to publicize my decision to run for the Peoples Party of Canada (PPC)the only party truly committed to fighting for freedom and womens sex-based rights. My candidacy was confirmed officially on Tuesday. That same day, I tried to access my bank account and could not. I contacted my bank, Vancity, and was informed the account had been frozen as per direction from the government. I had accessed my account just two days prior, so the timing was clear. I had not been informed of this freezing by anyone not the bank, not the government. No one attempted to contact me. I was completely blindsided. When I contacted my bank they refused to give me any information beyond the fact they were following government orders, and they gave me a number and name to contact. I called the number, and got a voicemail saying the employee was on vacation all week. So basically this guy froze my bank account and immediately went on vacation. His voicemail offered another extension to call, which I did. No one answered, so I left a message. I called again later that day and left another message. No one returned my call, so I called back the next day and left another message. Still no one returned my call. The following day I called again and received a message saying I could not get through on account of technical difficulties. I tried calling a general number, and asked the woman on the other end of the phone if she could please refer me to someone who could provide me with information about why my bank account was frozen. She told me, I cant give you any information unless you give me more information about whats going on, to which I responded, I have no information, thats why Im calling you: to get information. We went back and forth like this for a while until I asked her if she was retarded and then said, What exactly is your jobwhat is it you are being paid to do with the tax dollars of Canadians. She explained her job was to refer people who called to the appropriate departments, numbers, and individuals. Ok, I said. Then can you please refer me to someone who can explain to me what is going on with my bank account. She said No, and I hung up. It has now been a week since my bank account was frozen and I have received zero communication or information from the government. I had a flight booked back to Canada today, which I cancelled, because if my bank account is frozen I cant operate in the country and because I am very concerned about what awaits me upon arrival. I decided it wasnt worth the risk of persecution or attempted prosecution so will not be returning to Canada, despite my original intention to come back to campaign." He also highlights patient success stories, the Nobel Prize-winning history of Ivermectin, and explores other promising treatments like fenbendazole, a dog dewormer showing potential in cancer care. The episode examines the challenges of making these innovative treatments accessible amid ongoing resistance.', 'IVERMECTIN This drug won a Nobel Prize... But now they\'re trying to hide it. Ivermectin. Here\'s what it is, what it does, and why they don\'t want you to know the truth: 1. What is Ivermectin? Ivermectin is an antiparasitic drug originally developed to treat river blindness and other parasitic infections. It won the Nobel Prize in Medicine in 2015 for its lifesaving impact. So why is it controversial now? 2. Antiviral Properties of Ivermectin Research has shown that ivermectin has antiviral properties beyond its use against parasites. It has been studied to treat: Dengue fever COVID-19 Zika virus HIV But every time it shows potential, the dominant narrative tries to discredit it. 3. How does Ivermectin work? Ivermectin works by inhibiting viral replication and reducing inflammation. It has been shown to: Block viral entry into cells Modulate the immune response Disrupt viral RNA replication Despite promising data, it was severely suppressed. 4. The Controversy Surrounding Ivermectin During the COVID-19 pandemic, ivermectin became a highly controversial topic. Doctors using it faced: Censorship Media smear campaigns Threats to their medical licenses Why so much resistance to a cheap and safe drug? 5. The Real Reason They Don\'t Want You to Use It Follow the Money. Ivermectin is off-patent and cheap. If it worked for major diseases, it would threaten: The need for expensive new drugs Control over medical narratives The pharmaceutical industry\'s multi-billion-dollar treatments 6. What Science Really Says Despite censorship, studies have shown: Positive results in certain clinical trials Antiviral effects in laboratory settings Benefits in modulating the immune system However, many trials were rushed, flawed, or designed to fail. 7. Safety and History of Ivermectin Ivermectin has been used for decades with an excellent safety record. More than 4 billion doses have been administered worldwide. However, it suddenly became "dangerous" when people began to explore its broader benefits. 8. Who benefits from censorship? The same people who: Profit from expensive new drugs Control medical guidelines Own the major media outlets If there\'s a cheap solution, they have no incentive to tell you about it. REMEMBER WHEN the media laughed and said ivermectin was ONLY for horses and cows? THEY KNEW it was created for humans back in 1987. Here\'s what they didn\'t tell you 1) It prevents damage caused by mRNA-based drugs, blocks the Spike protein from entering cells, and, if the person was vaccinated, they can be treated to reduce the damage already caused by ivermectin. 2) It only has beneficial effects and no harmful effects in treating the C virus. In fact, before entering the cell, it has already destroyed the virus in the blood. 3) It has powerful anti-inflammatory properties, impacts traumatic and orthopedic injuries, strengthens muscles, and lacks the side effects of corticosteroids. 4) It treats autoimmune diseases such as rheumatoid arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, fibromyalgia, psoriasis, Crohn\'s disease, and allergic rhinitis. 5) It improves immunity in cancer patients, treats herpes simplex and shingles, and reduces the frequency of sinusitis and diverticulitis. 6) It protects the heart in situations of cardiac overload. In a stroke, for example, it prevents cardiac hypoxia by stimulating basic energy production, preventing tissue destruction, and improving heart function. 7) It is antiparasitic and antineoplastic (anticancer). It is said to suppress the proliferation and metastasis of cancer cells, preserving healthy cells and improving the effectiveness of chemotherapy. 8) It can eliminate chemotherapy-resistant cancer cells, defeating resistance to multiple cancer treatments. Combined with chemotherapy or anticancer agents, it increases the effectiveness of these treatments. 9) It is antimicrobial (against bacteria and viruses) and strengthens the immune system. 10) It reaches the central nervous system and regenerates nerves. 11) It regulates glucose, insulin metabolism, cholesterol levels, and reduces liver fat in steatosis. 12) It can be used as a prophylactic agent and has been associated with a significant reduction in C-19 infection, hospitalization, and mortality. Conclusion This goes beyond a single drug. It\'s about how medicine is: Censored Politicized Controlled Always question the narrative. Always follow the money.']
